articles.title: Atlanta Braves extend Austin Riley with massive contract
articles.description: The Braves have locked up star 3B Austin Riley with a 10-year contract worth $212 million, the team announced Monday.
articles.content:
The Atlanta Braves have signed star third baseman Austin Riley to a 10-year, $212 million contract, the team announced Monday.
The deal runs through the 2032 season, and it includes a $20 million cl… [+1108 chars]

articles.title: Pat Narduzzi of Pittsburgh Panthers joins chorus of college football coaches hoping for NIL guardrails
articles.description: Pitt's Pat Narduzzi said he'd like to see some sort of guardrails on NIL rules and called the current set-up essentially a pathway for backroom deals that are difficult for schools to regulate.
articles.content: PITTSBURGH -- Pittsburgh coach Pat Narduzzi thinks name, image and likeness rules were "probably" violated over the spring, not so subtly hinting those violations led to star wide receiver Jordan Add… [+2029 chars]

articles.author: Nick WagonerESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: San Francisco 49ers consider offensive options for newly signed Deebo Samuel, 'a special player'
articles.description: 49ers veteran wideout Deebo Samuel signed his lucrative three-year contract extension Monday, bringing an end to the question of whether he will remain with San Francisco for the foreseeable future.

articles.title: Sources - Houston Astros acquire Trey Mancini from Baltimore Orioles
articles.description: The Houston Astros have acquired Trey Mancini from the Baltimore Orioles, sources confirmed to ESPN.
articles.content:
The Houston Astros have acquired first baseman/outfielder Trey Mancini from the Baltimore Orioles, sources confirmed to ESPN.

articles.title: Sources -- New York Yankees acquire starter Frankie Montas, closer Lou Trivino from Oakland Athletics
articles.description: The Yankees have now shored up their rotation for a playoff push, adding righty Frankie Montas and closer Lou Trivino in a deal with Oakland.
articles.content:
The New York Yankees are finalizing a deal to acquire right-handed starter Frankie Montas and closer Lou Trivino from the Oakland Athletics, sources confirmed to ESPN.

articles.title: Source: Dallas Cowboys concerned WR James Washington has Jones fracture in foot
articles.description: The Dallas Cowboys are concerned that veteran wide receiver James Washington suffered a Jones fracture in a foot Monday, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.
articles.content:

articles.title: Source - San Diego Padres get Milwaukee Brewers closer Josh Hader in trade, send out closer Taylor Rogers
articles.description: The Padres have acquired closer Josh Hader in a trade with the Brewers that sends Taylor Rogers and three other players to Milwaukee, a source told ESPN's Jeff Passan
articles.content:
The Milwaukee Brewers are trading star reliever Josh Hader to the San Diego Padres, a source told ESPN's Jeff Passan on Monday.
Hader, an All-Star for the fourth time this year, leads the majors wit… [+640 chars]

articles.title: Source - Cleveland Browns QB Deshaun Watson suspended 6 games for violating NFL's personal conduct policy
articles.description: Browns quarterback Deshaun Watson will serve a six-game suspension for violating the league's personal conduct policy following accusations of sexual misconduct, disciplinary officer Sue L. Robinson ruled Monday, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.
